events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund immediately as this product does not meet my expectations.
The reported issue has been categorized under Refund due to the customer's request for money back related to receiving the wrong product.
Support agent Jessica has been assigned to handle the refund case for this customer complaint regarding the wrong item received.
Hello, this is Jessica from customer support. I'm sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I'll help you with the refund process right away.
Could you please provide your order number and upload a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund quickly?
Sure, my order number is 789456123. I have attached a photo showing the item I received instead of the one I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method and you do not need to return the incorrect item.
Thanks a lot for the quick resolution and the refund offer without needing to return the product. Appreciate your help.
The refund has been processed successfully. You should see the amount credited back on your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with regarding your order.
Yes, I got the refund yesterday. Everything is great now. Thanks for following up and resolving my issue so quickly.
We are glad your issue was resolved. Closing the case now. Have a wonderful day and thank you for contacting support.
